question:
Question: Where do you start and end your journey?  
Choices:  
A. Start at the road and end behind a tall building.  
B. Start at the lake bund and end at the beginning of the road.  
C. Start above a car park and end at the road with trees on both sides.  
D. Start at the pavilion and end in the middle of the lake.  
E. Start above the tree-lined road and end at the wooden pavilion by the lake.

textgrad_result.init_answer: Option: E; Reason: The journey begins with a view of a tree-lined road (as seen in the initial frames) and progresses towards a wooden pavilion situated by the lake (visible in the later frames). This matches the description in option E.
textgrad_result.evaluation:
Location: [(0, 10), (45, 53)]
Option: E
Reason: The video starts with a view from above a tree-lined road. As the video progresses, the view moves towards a wooden pavilion by the lake. This matches option E.
textgrad_result.final_answer: Option: E; Reason: The journey begins with a view of a tree-lined road (as seen in the initial frames) and progresses towards a wooden pavilion situated by the lake (visible in the later frames). This matches the description in option E.
